enrollment_events.name: course_id
enrollment_events.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

enrollment_events.name: time
enrollment_events.description: Timestamp indicating when the enrollment event took place

enrollment_events.name: user_id
enrollment_events.description: A numeric ID of the learner on the edX platform

enrollment_events.name: mode
enrollment_events.description: The mode of enrollment (honor, audit, verified, no-id-professional, etc.)

enrollment_events.name: activated
enrollment_events.description: Whether or not the corresponding enrollment mode is activated.

enrollment_events.name: deactivated
enrollment_events.description: Whether or not the corresponding enrollment mode is deactivated.

enrollment_events.name: mode_changed
enrollment_events.description: Whether or not the enrollment event was a change of mode

enrollment_events.name: upgraded
enrollment_events.description: Whether or not the enrollment event indicates an upgrade to a paid mode (verified)

enrollment_events.name: event_type
enrollment_events.description: The type of the enrollment event. This is one of the log events from the tracking logs

description: Table generated with SQL query file enrollment_events.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks enrollment event modes (audit, honor, verified, etc.)
